title: Monster Slayer Glaive
content: Monster Slayer Glaive Rare 2~11 Damage 1d10 +1 Slashing Monster Slayer: This weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage against monstrosity type foes. Refined Vaulting: Jump distance is increased by 1.5 m. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Monster-slaying is a rare calling, not for the faint of heart.
